entry.source: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A powerful barrier prevents you from{F801}proceeding...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,255001}This is pitiful next to the Lord's{F801}fearsome power. It is nothing but{F801}a shallow joke of Lucifer's.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255002}Does he think he can keep me at bay{F801}with such petty tricks?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,-1058}{F813,0,255001}This is pitiful next to the Lord's{F801}fearsome power. It is nothing but{F801}a shallow joke of Lucifer's.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255002}Does he think he can keep me at bay{F801}with such petty tricks?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The barrier was blasted away.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The barrier was blasted away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,255004}The Lord's chariot does not retreat.{F801}Those who bar the way shall be{F801}trampled underfoot.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,255004}The Lord's chariot does not retreat.{F801}Those who bar the way shall be{F801}trampled underfoot.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Echoing voice\0{F813,0,255005}...You've come.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Echoing voice\0{F813,0,255005}...You've come.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,229}{F813,0,255006}Son of man, you praise a false God,{F801}and have sold your very soul.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255007}{F87A,229}Your spirit is utterly worthless.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,229}{F813,0,255006}Son of man, you praise a false God,{F801}and have sold your very soul.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255007}{F87A,229}Your spirit is utterly worthless.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0ゆえに[無価値/むかち]なる[魂/たましい]の[人/ひと]の[子/こ]よ{F801}ここで[引導/いんどう]を[渡/わた]して[差/さ]し[上/あ]げましょう{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0ゆえに[無価値/むかち]なる[魂/たましい]の[人/ひと]の[子/こ]よ{F801}ここで[引導/いんどう]を[渡/わた]して[差/さ]し[上/あ]げましょう{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Echoing voice\0{F813,0,255008}Foolish lamb who has relinquished your{F801}very consciousness to God...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Echoing voice\0{F813,0,255008}Foolish lamb who has relinquished your{F801}very consciousness to God...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F813,0,255009}{F87A,228}What do you think has allowed you{F801}humans to progress and evolve so far?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255010}It was thanks to our existence.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F813,0,255009}{F87A,228}What do you think has allowed you{F801}humans to progress and evolve so far?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255010}It was thanks to our existence.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,228}{F813,0,255011}A human's true strength is only drawn{F801}out by the adversity of chaos.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255012}God's order will bring you nothing{F801}but degradation and lowliness.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,228}{F813,0,255011}A human's true strength is only drawn{F801}out by the adversity of chaos.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,255012}God's order will bring you nothing{F801}but degradation and lowliness.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,255013}This one is truly nothing but Filth.{F801}It is beyond salvation.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,255013}This one is truly nothing but Filth.{F801}It is beyond salvation.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,228}{F813,0,255014}I will prove my point with a battle{F801}to the death...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,228}{F813,0,255014}I will prove my point with a battle{F801}to the death...{F801}

entry.source: メúカバーが封印を解く{F801}
entry.target: メúカバーが封印を解く{F801}
